data.title: 98 Inch TVs
data.meta_description: Big screen television enthusiasts, prepare yourselves! We’ve gathered the best 98-inch TV options on the market, guaranteed to make your home the ultimate viewing destination. Whether you’re a sports…
data.text:
Big screen television enthusiasts, prepare yourselves! We’ve gathered the best 98-inch TV options on the market, guaranteed to make your home the ultimate viewing destination. Whether you’re a sports fan, a movie aficionado, or just a big screen lover, this roundup is your key to the ultimate home theater experience.

In this comprehensive article, we’ll take a deep dive into the features, pros, and cons of each 98-inch TV, helping you make an informed decision. From unbeatable visual clarity to state-of-the-art sound systems, we’ve got you covered. So get cozy and expect your jaw to drop as you prepare to make the ultimate 98-inch TV purchase!

The Top 9 Best 98 Inch TVs

Samsung DU9000 98" Crystal UHD Smart TV (2024) — HDR10+ 4K Picture Quality with Alexa & Bixby Integration — Immerse yourself in vivid 4K resolution and superior sound quality with Samsung’s 98-inch DU9000 Crystal UHD Smart TV, featuring smart home compatibility and dynamic gaming features.

Hisense U8 Mini-LED 4K QLED Smart TV 90 Inches — Experience stunning 100-inch 4K visuals and unmatched sound with the Hisense 100U8K Mini-LED QLED Smart Google TV, packed with features for ultimate entertainment and immersive gaming experience.

TCL 98Q651G — Giant 98" Q6 Q-Class 4K UHD HDR Smart Google TV — Experience stunning 4K UHD HDR Smart Google TV with the TCL 98Q651G, a 98-inch QLED Q-Class gem that brings sleek design and top-notch performance to your home.

98" Neo QLED HDR TV with CPS Enhanced Protection Pack Bundle — An impressive 98-inch Neo QLED HDR 4K UHD Smart TV bundled with protective features and exceptional clarity, vivid colors, and enhanced motion performance for an immersive entertainment experience.

Samsung 98-Inch QLED 4K Smart TV with Direct TV Stream Device and Bluetooth Connectivity — Experience stunning 4K visuals, premium sound, and seamless streaming with Samsung’s 98-inch QLED Smart TV, perfect for cord-cutters who crave entertainment and functionality.

98-Inch 4K QLED Smart TV with Enhanced Coverage and 120Hz Refresh Rate (2023) — Experience breathtaking picture quality, stunning colors, and immersive sound with the 98-inch 4K QLED Samsung QN98Q80CAFXZA Smart TV, backed by a 4-year warranty and enhanced with Dolby Smart TV technology.

Samsung QN98Q80CA 98-inch QLED 4K Smart TV Bundle with TaskRabbit Installation and CPS Enhanced Protection Pack — Experience exceptional picture quality and cutting-edge gaming features with the Samsung QN98Q80CA 98 inch QLED 4K Smart TV, designed for ultimate home entertainment and backed by TaskRabbit installation services and a 2-year enhanced protection package.

QLED 4K UHD TV with AI-Enhanced HDR & Hands-Free Voice Control — Experience breathtaking 4K HDR image quality, vivid colors, and effortless voice control with the TCL 98" Class XL Collection 4K UHD QLED Dolby Vision HDR Smart Google TV.

TCL 98 Inch S Class 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV with HDR Support — Experience breathtaking 4K UHD entertainment on TCL’s 98 inch S Class LED Smart TV, featuring crisp visuals, vibrant colors, and immersive sound, all while offering fast input response and easy setup for hassle-free viewing.

As an Amazon Affiliate™, we receive compensation from qualified purchases at no cost to you

Reviews

Samsung DU9000 98" Crystal UHD Smart TV (2024) — HDR10+ 4K Picture Quality with Alexa & Bixby Integration

Bring the cinema experience right into your living room with the Samsung Crystal UHD Smart TV. This impressive 98-inch panel boasts a stunning 4K resolution and vibrant HDR10+ colors, delivering an immersive viewing experience. The TV’s built-in sound system offers Adaptive Sound and Q-Symphony for an unparalleled audio experience.

Connectivity options include Bluetooth 5.2, LAN, and Wi-Fi, providing seamless connectivity to your smart devices. And with smart home compatibility through Alexa, Bixby, and Google Assistant, you can control your TV with ease. The TV’s gaming features are also top-notch, providing a smooth gaming experience with FreeSync Premium and Super Ultra Wide Game View.

The Samsung DU9000 Series also comes with an extensive list of features, including energy-saving modes, a built-in LED backlight, and a slim, sleek design that saves space. The TV’s remote control supports multiple languages and comes with easy-to-use functionality.

As per user reviews, the TV is highly recommended for its stunning picture quality, easy setup, and affordable price point. Users have been impressed by the TV’s crisp 4K resolution and have found the built-in audio system to be immersive and impressive. Overall, this TV makes a great addition to any home entertainment setup.

Hisense U8 Mini-LED 4K QLED Smart TV 90 Inches

I’ve had the pleasure of using the Hisense 100" Mini-LED QLED TV for the past few months, and I must say, it’s been a fantastic addition to my home entertainment setup. The screen size is simply breathtaking, making every movie and TV show feel more immersive and cinematic. However, the TV’s weight is definitely something to consider when it comes to mounting or repositioning it.

One of my favorite features of this TV is its 4K resolution and HDR capabilities. The colors are vibrant and crisp, and the contrast is excellent, resulting in a stunning visual experience. I particularly enjoy using the TV with my gaming console, as the 144Hz refresh rate and the responsive input make for a smooth gaming experience.

While the built-in Google TV OS offers a user-friendly interface, the voice control feature sometimes struggles to recognize commands, especially in noisy environments. Additionally, the Wi-Fi 6E compatibility is a welcome addition, but not all devices may be compatible, which can limit the range of devices you can connect to the TV.

Overall, the Hisense 100" Mini-LED QLED TV is an impressive device with a few minor drawbacks. Its screen size, resolution, and HDR capabilities make it a great choice for those seeking an immersive home theater experience.

TCL 98Q651G — Giant 98" Q6 Q-Class 4K UHD HDR Smart Google TV

I recently had the chance to try out the TCL 98Q651G, a massive 98-inch QLED Smart TV. Impressively, I found it quite easy to set up and connect to my home network, thanks to its built-in Wi-Fi and Google TV compatibility. The user interface was smooth and intuitive, allowing me to navigate through my favorite shows and movies without any hiccups.

One of the standout features of this TV is its stunning 4K Ultra HD resolution, which made everything I watched look incredibly sharp and vibrant. The QLED panel type also delivered impressive color accuracy and vivid contrast. I was particularly impressed by its high dynamic range (HDR) support, which enhanced picture quality with more realistic highlights and shadows.

A drawback I noticed during my experience was the audio quality, which felt a bit lacking compared to the visual performance. The built-in speakers, with a maximum output of 10 watts, struggled to fill the room with rich, immersive sound. However, the TV did support external audio devices, so this issue could be easily addressed with a separate sound system.

Overall, the TCL 98Q651G proved to be an impressive, feature-rich Smart TV that offered a stunning visual experience. While the audio quality could use some improvement, the combination of its sleek design, dependable performance, and cutting-edge features make it a prime contender for anyone in the market for a large-screen TV.

98" Neo QLED HDR TV with CPS Enhanced Protection Pack Bundle

I recently had the opportunity to enjoy this massive beast of a TV, the Samsung 98-inch QLED Smart. It certainly brought an unforgettable movie-night experience to my living room. The incredible 4K clarity and superb color accuracy made every scene pop with vibrancy and clarity.

One of the standout features was the Object Tracking Sound (OTS), which added an immersive element to the viewing experience. The speakers didn’t just play the sound, they seemed to project it around the room, making me feel truly engrossed in the action.

Brightness was another standout aspect. It handled different lighting environments excellently, and even in a sunlit room, the picture remained vibrant and clear. The Ultra Viewing Angle also added to the viewing pleasure, making certain that every angle was as enjoyable as the view from the front.

It wasn’t all smooth sailing though. The TV felt a bit heavy when trying to move it, and setup was a tad more complicated than I anticipated. Additionally, the sound quality wasn’t consistent across different channels, and there was a noticeable delay when unmuting, which could disrupt dialogues.

Despite these minor hiccups, this Samsung QLED TV truly delivered a jaw-dropping visual and auditory experience.

Samsung 98-Inch QLED 4K Smart TV with Direct TV Stream Device and Bluetooth Connectivity

Picture quality on this Samsung QN98Q80CA 98-inch QLED 4K Smart TV is simply stunning. Every detail is crisp and colorful under the sun, even in bright rooms. The LED’s precision makes everything feel more immersive and vibrant. This TV’s Direct Full Array technology brightens the picture, even when sunlight enters the room. I especially appreciated the Quantum HDR+, which elevate the latest movies and TV shows to cinema-like levels of richness and depth.

This Smart TV is more than just smart; it’s intuitive and user-friendly. Set-up was a breeze, and the interface remains responsive even during intense gaming scenes. I love the Smart Hub, as it makes it quick and easy for me to find what I want to watch without scouring channels.

When it comes to gaming, the Samsung QN98Q80CA hits all the right spots. With its built-in FreeSync Premium Pro, lag and stuttering are eliminated, providing a seamless gaming experience. The Ultra-low latency and motion Xcelerator Turbo 4K/120Hz technology make the action smooth and engaging, even in fast-paced action games. Plus, with the mini-map zoom feature, keeping track of your opponents is always a cinch.

In terms of design, the sleek and slim design of the TV makes it the perfect addition to any living space. And, the Ambient Mode+ allows for the best possible viewing angles and adapts the screen to blend with the background.

The Solar Cell Remote is a neat feature, not to mention it’s rechargeable! Samsung TV Plus can tune me into free live TV, providing endless entertainment options. Multi View is another great feature, enabling me to watch multiple things simultaneously on my TV screen.

However, this TV could be heavier than one would expect considering the size, making it a bit difficult to move around and install. I also noticed that assembly instructions could have been clearer and easier to follow.

In the end, the Samsung QN98Q80CA’s 98-inch screen, superior picture and sound quality, and user-friendly Smart TV features make it a worthwhile investment for movie and game lovers alike.

98-Inch 4K QLED Smart TV with Enhanced Coverage and 120Hz Refresh Rate (2023)

Imagine having a massive 98-inch screen in your living room, capable of bringing vibrant colors and unmatched clarity to your favorite movies and TV shows. That’s what the Samsung QN98Q80CAFXZA has to offer — a stunning display that feels like you’re right in the middle of the action.

The Titan Black color of this QLED TV adds an elegant touch to any room, and the Direct Full Array technology ensures that the images on the screen are crisp and clear, no matter what you’re watching. The 4K resolution and 120Hz refresh rate make sure that fast-paced scenes and high-resolution content look perfect.

One of the standout features of this Samsung TV is its compatibility with Dolby Smart TV, which enhances your viewing experience by optimizing audio and video quality. And with an additional 4-year coverage by Epic Protect, you can have peace of mind knowing that your investment is protected.

However, the Samsung QN98Q80CAFXZA is not without its minor drawbacks. It can consume more energy than some other TVs, and the price tag might be a bit of a deterrent for some. But considering the top-notch picture quality and advanced features it offers, the high price point becomes more acceptable.

Overall, the Samsung QN98Q80CAFXZA is a breathtaking 98-inch QLED TV that delivers a cinematic experience like no other. Its stunning visuals, advanced technology, and thoughtful extra coverage make it a must-have for any TV enthusiast.

Samsung QN98Q80CA 98-inch QLED 4K Smart TV Bundle with TaskRabbit Installation and CPS Enhanced Protection Pack

Imagine watching your favorite movie or TV show on a 98-inch screen, with a picture so clear and vibrant that it feels like you’re really there, as if you’re inside the scene. That’s what this Samsung QLED 4K Smart TV offers, and it’s not just the size that impresses.

The TV’s sound quality is impressive too, with its Direct Full Array and Dolby Atmos technology delivering a refined audio/visual experience. Plus, its wide viewing angle means that no matter where you’re sitting, you’re getting the best view.

But this isn’t just a TV, it’s a smart one. With Samsung Gaming Hub, you can stream your favorite games without the need for a console. The Smart Hub makes it easy to find and stream what you want, and the Universal Guide provides tailored recommendations for both streaming and live TV.

The Samsung Health app even helps you maintain a balanced lifestyle, and with Telemed, you can meet with a doctor right from your living room. And when it comes to connecting other devices, the SmartThings compatibility makes it a breeze.

This TV truly is an all-in-one entertainment hub, and the 2-year CPS Enhanced Protection Pack and TaskRabbit installation services just add that extra layer of convenience and peace of mind. It’s not just a TV, it’s a lifestyle.

QLED 4K UHD TV with AI-Enhanced HDR & Hands-Free Voice Control

Imagine having a TV experience like no other! I recently got my hands on the TCL XL Collection QLED TV, and it has truly been an amazing addition to my home theater. The sheer size of this wall-devouring 98" display feels almost unreal, while the brushed metal design adds a touch of elegance that perfectly complements the vivid colors it displays.

The picture quality is simply exceptional — thanks to Quantum Dot technology and the HDR Pro Pack with Dolby Vision, this 4K HDR display captures every detail and offers greater contrast. It’s a delight to watch movies and TV shows in their original colors, with brightness that stands out. The Contrast Control Zones technology is another highlight, optimizing the image across zones, creating striking contrast between light and dark areas.

However, I also noticed some limitations. For instance, the Voice Control feature isn’t always responsive, which can be frustrating occasionally. And while the TV has built-in Chromecast, the absence of Apple AirPlay is a downer for Apple fans.

Overall, the TCL XL Collection QLED TV has been an extraordinary upgrade. Its impressive picture quality, hands-free voice control, and easy home control make it a fantastic smart TV experience.

TCL 98 Inch S Class 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV with HDR Support

Experience the ultimate entertainment with this 98-inch TCL Class S5 4K UHD HDR LED Smart TV. With a 4K Ultra HD resolution, you’ll enjoy four times the detail as Full HD TVs. The 120Hz Panel Refresh Rate ensures a smooth and blur-free viewing experience, while the Motion Rate 480 with MEMC Frame Insertion provides exceptional motion clarity for fast-action movies, sports, and games. This TV boasts a wide color gamut for an astonishingly lifelike picture and High Brightness Direct LED Backlight for brighter images. With support for Dolby Vision, HDR 10, HDR 10+, and HLG HDR formats, you’ll witness enhanced contrast and accurate colors.

The AIPQ Engine with Deep Learning AI optimizes color, contrast, and clarity for an even better viewing experience. Gamers will appreciate the Auto Game Mode and Game Accelerator 240 for reduced lag and responsive gameplay. Immerse yourself in the sound experience with DTS Virtual: X, a 3D audio technology. The FullView Metal Bezel-less Design blends seamlessly into your entertainment space.

Despite its massive size, it’s relatively easy to set up. Connectivity options include Bluetooth 5.0, HDMI inputs for both 2.0 and 2.1, USB ports, and even Chromecast for screen mirroring. The voice remote makes it easy to navigate the Google TV platform, which has Apple TV+, Netflix, Prime Video, YouTube TV, and Disney+.

The TV is compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant for hands-free control. While it’s on the heavy side and may be difficult to find a stand that fits this large display, the overall build quality and visual appeal of this massive Smart TV make it worth considering for your home theater setup.

Buyer’s Guide

Choosing the right 98-inch TV is an exciting process, but it can also be overwhelming with so many options available in the market. This buyer’s guide aims to provide you with essential information, features, considerations, and advice to help you make an informed decision. Remember that the goal is to find a 98-inch TV that best suits your needs and preferences without considering specific product picks or external resources.

Top Features to Consider

When looking for a top-tier 98-inch TV, consider the following features to ensure you get optimal performance and enjoyment from your purchase. 1) Display Technology: LED and QLED panels are common choices, offering sharp images and vivid colors. 2) Smart Features: A smart TV with built-in streaming services is convenient for accessing your favorite content. 3) Audio Quality: High-quality speakers and surround sound systems enhance your viewing experience.

Size and Room Considerations

TV Weight: A heavy-duty mounting system or a professional installation may be required for a 98-inch TV. Check the manufacturer’s recommendations for weight support. 2) Room Dimensions: Ensure the TV fits comfortably in the room with enough space for viewing and user interaction. 3) Sunlight Reflection: Consider the amount of ambient light in your viewing area and the TV’s anti-glare properties to reduce eye strain.

Cost and Budget

Set a budget: 98-inch TVs can be expensive. Stick to a budget that suits your financial limitations. 2) Price vs. Performance: Look for a balance between the desired features and the price range. Higher-end models may provide better performance, but lower-priced options might still be suitable if you prioritize certain features. 3) Sales and Discounts: Keep an eye out for sales and promotions to get a better deal on your desired 98-inch TV.

General Advice

Research: Read reviews, check ratings, and consult expert opinions to make an informed purchasing decision. 2) Warranty: Choose a 98-inch TV with a good warranty to cover potential technical issues. 3) Customer Support: Look for manufacturers with reliable and helpful customer support to assist you with any post-purchase concerns.

FAQ

What dimensions does a 98-inch TV have?

A 98-inch TV boasts an impressive screen size that measures 8.16 feet (98 inches) diagonally. This massive TV falls into the category of super-sized screens, offering an immersive viewing experience with stunning details and top-notch image quality. With a size ideal for large living rooms, home theaters, or commercial settings seeking a bold and dramatic impact, it stands out as a standout choice for many.

However, it’s essential to note that large TVs require more space for installation and viewing, as well as careful mounting and handling to prevent accidents or damage to the TV or surrounding area. Also, the price tag of a 98-inch TV can be quite high, but the vast screen size and excellent picture quality make it a tempting proposition for TV enthusiasts.

Which brands manufacture 98-inch TVs?

Several leading brands cater to the 98-inch TV market, including LG, Samsung, and Sony. Renowned for their high-end, high-quality televisions, these companies meet the expectations of customers seeking impressive visuals and a cinematic experience at home. Other brands like TCL, Hisense, and Philips also offer large-screen models with premium options that could reach a 98-inch size.

When shopping for a 98-inch TV, consider factors such as available screen resolutions, contrast ratios, HD resolution support, and smart features. Compare models across brands to determine which television offers the best combination of price, features, and performance for your needs and budget.

What advantages come with a 98-inch TV?

A 98-inch TV brings numerous benefits to the table, providing an immersive viewing experience. With a large screen, movies, games, and sports become even more impactful, making viewers feel like they are part of the action. It’s perfect for hosting gatherings, events, or parties where everyone can enjoy an exceptional visual experience.

Additionally, 98-inch TVs offer incredible detail and image quality with a cinematic feel. This allows users to see subtle visual details and textures that would be lost on smaller screens, resulting in highly convincing and engaging viewing sessions, ideal for film aficionados and gamers seeking the best visual performance.

What are the drawbacks of owning a 98-inch TV?

Despite the numerous benefits, there are several drawbacks to consider before purchasing a 98-inch TV. These TVs can be quite heavy, making them challenging to mount or move without assistance. Additionally, they require a significant amount of space for placement, which might be an issue for those with smaller living areas. The installation process also needs to be performed carefully, taking into account the size and weight.

Furthermore, larger TVs generate more heat than smaller models. It’s crucial to ensure that the TV has proper ventilation, especially in warmer environments, to prevent overheating. Lastly, the cost of a 98-inch TV can be prohibitive for some consumers. However, if the benefits align with your needs and preferences, investing in a 98-inch display could provide an unparalleled viewing experience.

What is the primary concern when buying a 98-inch TV?

The main concern when considering a 98-inch TV is likely the price point. These large, high-end displays typically come at a premium. The cost can be a barrier for many potential buyers. However, if the investment aligns with your needs, preferences, and budget, and you desire the ultimate viewing experience, a 98-inch TV may seem worth the extra spend.

Another concern for many consumers could be the installation process. Large TVs require careful handling and installation to ensure their weight and size are supported correctly. This could potentially be more complicated than a typical installation and might require hiring professionals or dedicated TV mounts. It’s critical to consider these factors before making a purchase to avoid any issues in the future.

What standard features often come with a 98-inch TV?

A 98-inch TV typically comes with features similar to standard-sized TVs from top brands, with a few adjustments to accommodate the large screen size. Common features include support for 4K/8K resolution, HDMI and USB input ports, built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for streaming, and a wide array of HDMI channels for connectivity options. Many high-end models also offer smart TV features such as apps, voice control, and advanced web browsing capabilities.

In addition, some brands might include exclusive features like quantum dot technology, 4K Ultra HD, and HDR (High Dynamic Range) for superior color accuracy and contrast performance. Other unique features could include built-in gaming controls for gaming consoles or built-in sound systems for optimal audio performance. Thoroughly research and compare features of different models when considering a 98-inch TV to find the best fit for your needs and preferences.
